scripts.lint: npm run setup && standard -v --env mocha ./packages/meteor-simple-schema/ | snazzy
scripts.lint:fix: npm run setup && standard --env mocha --fix ./packages/meteor-simple-schema/ | snazzy
scripts.test: METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS='../' TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer TEST_SERVER=0 meteor test-packages --once --raw-logs --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ../
scripts.test:watch: METEOR_PACKAGE_DIRS='../' TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer TEST_SERVER=0 TEST_WATCH=1 meteor test-packages --raw-logs --driver-package meteortesting:mocha ../
